item.title: Smart Lora Irrigation System
item.description:
Smart Lora Irrigation System

PKYDrip‚Äôs Smart LoRa Irrigation System is designed to provide wireless, low-power, and efficient irrigation control for both agricultural and landscape applications. It enables long-distance control of valves, sensors, and pumps without the need for complex wiring or internet connectivity.
